de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.eventhandling

Class EventDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.eventhandling.EventDispatcher

  • @Path(value="eventdispatcher/")
public final class EventDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    The event dispatcher class is responsible for manage registrations from Events to RestQueries.

      • registerExclusiveEvents

        public static void registerExclusiveEvents(java.util.List<AbstractEvent> events)
        Saves that events are alternative to each other, so that they can be skipped when one of the is triggered. The events have to be registered
        Parameters:
        events - the events that are alternative to each other (e.g. behind a event based gateway)
